name: demo for a fan-game i forgot to work on oops
name_original: demo for a fan-game i forgot to work on oops
description:
Oopsie i forgot this fan-game existed. Good thing i still had the demo files i was intending to post on MFGG. But that will take a long time since i was banned for a few months.

Basic Controls:

Z - Run (Hold it down!)

X - Jump

Arrow Keys - Walk

Credits:

Ziggity for literally the only music you hear in this old demo that i forgot to optimize.

Nintendo for obvious reasons.

Hartflip0218 for doing the Mario sprites.
